title: Biometric Sensor Firmware
summary: Firmware for a custom PCB that reads and processes biometric data in real-time with low power consumption.
architecture: Microcontroller-based system using FreeRTOS for task scheduling. I2C and SPI for sensor communication. BLE for data transmission.
responsibilities: Wrote the complete firmware, designed power management strategies, and implemented the communication protocols.

title: Modular Smart Home Hub
summary: A central hub for smart home devices with a custom-designed enclosure and modular hardware components.
architecture: Main control board with an ESP32, connected to swappable modules for different protocols (Zigbee, Z-Wave).
responsibilities: Designed the 3D-printable enclosure, laid out the main PCB, and developed a proof-of-concept module.
